Title: Saved Searches
Saved Searches: As a record label scout, I want the ability to save my search criteria so that I can easily revisit and review previous search results.
Unnamed: 2: Saves time and effort by allowing the scout to quickly access previously saved search filters and results.
Unnamed: 3: The platform should provide a feature to save search filters and search results for future reference.The saved searches should be easily accessible and editable.

Title: Title
Saved Searches: Description

Title: Intuitive User Interface
Saved Searches: The platform should have a user-friendly interface that is easy to navigate and understand, allowing musicians, influencers, record labels, and brands to quickly find the information they need and perform desired actions.

Title: Efficient Content Collaboration
Saved Searches: The platform should provide seamless collaboration features, allowing musicians and influencers to easily communicate, share files, and work together on content production projects.

Title: Clear Creator Profiles
Saved Searches: The platform should display comprehensive and well-organized profiles for musicians and influencers, showcasing their skills, experience, portfolio, and social media presence, making it easy for record labels and brands to evaluate their suitability for collaboration or sponsorship.

Title: Streamlined Search and Filtering
Saved Searches: The platform should offer advanced search and filtering options, enabling record label scouts to quickly find relevant creators based on criteria such as genre, location, follower count, engagement rate, and previous collaborations.

Title: Responsive and Mobile-Friendly Design
Saved Searches: The platform should be responsive and optimized for mobile devices, ensuring a seamless user experience across different screen sizes and devices.

Title: Effortless Saved Searches
Saved Searches: The platform should allow record label scouts to save their search criteria, making it easy for them to revisit and review previous search results without having to re-enter the same filters.

Title: Fast Search Results Retrieval
Saved Searches: When record label scouts perform a saved search, the system should retrieve and display the search results within 2 seconds to ensure a smooth and efficient user experience.

Title: Low Latency for Profile Loading
Saved Searches: When viewing creator profiles, the system should load and display the profiles within 3 seconds to provide a seamless browsing experience for record labels and brands.

Title: Quick Search Criteria Saving
Saved Searches: When record label scouts save their search criteria, the system should process and save the criteria within 1 second to enable efficient management of previous search results.

Title: Efficient Sponsorship Deal Sign-up
Saved Searches: When record labels or brands sign creators for sponsorship deals, the system should handle the sign-up process within 2 seconds to ensure a smooth and timely transaction.

Title: Optimized Content Production Collaboration
Saved Searches: When musicians and influencers collaborate in content production, the system should provide real-time synchronization and updates within 1 second to facilitate efficient collaboration.

Title: High Availability for Collaboration Platform
Saved Searches: The platform should have a high availability rate of at least 99.99% to ensure uninterrupted access for musicians, influencers, record labels, and brands.

Title: Data Integrity and Security
Saved Searches: The platform should implement robust security measures to protect user data, including encryption of sensitive information and regular security audits.

Title: Scalability for Growing User Base
Saved Searches: The platform should be able to handle increasing user traffic and data volume as the user base grows, ensuring optimal performance and responsiveness.

Title: Backup and Disaster Recovery
Saved Searches: Regular backups of user data should be performed to minimize the risk of data loss. The platform should also have a disaster recovery plan in place to quickly restore services in the event of a catastrophic failure.

Title: Real-time Collaboration and Communication
Saved Searches: The platform should provide real-time collaboration and communication features, such as instant messaging and video conferencing, to facilitate seamless collaboration between musicians, influencers, record labels, and brands.

Title: Secure User Authentication
Saved Searches: The platform should implement secure user authentication mechanisms, such as multi-factor authentication or strong password policies, to prevent unauthorized access to user accounts.

Title: Data Encryption
Saved Searches: Sensitive user data, such as personal information and collaboration content, should be encrypted both at rest and in transit to protect against unauthorized access or data breaches.

Title: Access Controls
Saved Searches: The platform should have granular access controls to ensure that only authorized users can view and interact with specific content or perform certain actions. This includes role-based access controls and permission levels.

Title: Secure Communication Channels
Saved Searches: All communication channels within the platform, including messaging and file sharing, should be secured using encryption and secure protocols to prevent eavesdropping or interception of sensitive information.

Title: Secure Payment Processing
Saved Searches: If the platform involves financial transactions, it should integrate with secure payment gateways and comply with industry standards for secure payment processing, such as PCI DSS.

Title: Regular Security Audits
Saved Searches: The platform should undergo regular security audits and vulnerability assessments to identify and address any potential security weaknesses or vulnerabilities.

Title: Scalable User Profile Storage
Saved Searches: As the number of musicians, influencers, record labels, and brands using the platform increases, the system should be able to handle the storage and retrieval of a large number of user profiles efficiently.

Title: Horizontal Scalability for Content Production Collaboration
Saved Searches: To accommodate a growing number of collaborations between musicians and influencers, the system should be designed to scale horizontally, allowing for the addition of more servers or instances to handle increased content production demands.

Title: Efficient Search Result Retrieval for Record Label Scouts
Saved Searches: As the number of saved searches and search results grows, the system should ensure quick retrieval and display of previous search results for record label scouts, allowing them to efficiently review and revisit potential creators.

Title: Scalable Media Storage and Streaming
Saved Searches: To support the uploading and streaming of multimedia content, such as music tracks and videos, the system should be able to scale its media storage and streaming capabilities to handle increased user-generated content and playback demands.

Title: Vertical Scalability for Sponsorship Deal Management
Saved Searches: As the number of sponsorship deals between creators and brands increases, the system should be able to vertically scale its resources, such as processing power and memory, to handle the increased load of managing and tracking sponsorship deals.

Title: Compliance with Intellectual Property Rights
Saved Searches: The platform should ensure that all content shared and collaborated on adheres to intellectual property rights, including copyright and trademark laws.

Title: Data Privacy and Consent
Saved Searches: The platform should comply with data privacy regulations, ensuring that user data is collected, stored, and processed with proper consent and in accordance with applicable laws.

Title: Transparency in Sponsorship Deals
Saved Searches: The platform should provide transparency in sponsorship deals, including clear disclosure of sponsored content and proper labeling of advertisements, in compliance with advertising regulations.

Title: Age Verification
Saved Searches: If the platform allows users under a certain age to participate, it should implement age verification mechanisms to comply with age-restricted content regulations.

Title: Financial Transaction Security
Saved Searches: The platform should ensure the security of financial transactions, including secure payment processing and compliance with financial regulations to protect user financial information.

Title: Integration with Social Media APIs
Saved Searches: The platform should integrate with popular social media APIs (such as Instagram, YouTube) to allow creators to connect their accounts and showcase their content, and to enable record labels and brands to view creators' profiles and engagement metrics.

Title: Secure Authentication and Authorization
Saved Searches: The platform should implement secure authentication and authorization mechanisms, such as OAuth 2.0, to ensure that only authorized users (creators, record labels, brands) can access and interact with the platform's features and data.

Title: Real-time Notifications
Saved Searches: The platform should provide real-time notifications to creators, record labels, and brands for important events, such as new collaboration requests, sponsorship deals, or updates to saved searches, ensuring timely communication and collaboration.

Title: Data Privacy and Compliance
Saved Searches: The platform should comply with data privacy regulations (such as GDPR) and implement measures to protect user data, including encryption of sensitive information, secure storage, and proper handling of user consent for data processing.

Title: Integration with Payment Gateways
Saved Searches: The platform should integrate with payment gateways (such as PayPal, Stripe) to facilitate secure and seamless transactions for sponsorship deals, ensuring that creators receive timely and accurate payments.
